scripts.build: rm -rf dist/max/* && rm -rf dist/web/* && npm run webpack && cp src/max/gn-launchpad.maxpat dist/max && mkdir -p dist/max/config && cp src/config/* dist/max/config && mkdir -p dist/web/config && cp src/config/* dist/web/config
scripts.tsc: rm -rf dist/tsc/* && tsc && mkdir dist/tsc/config && cp src/config/* dist/tsc/config
